pages.text: $(bold)Gold and Silver Pieces$() are a form of currency that has been stamped and approved by the Tradewinds Consortium.$(p)These coins have been minted from special alloys and are impossible to counterfeit with a crafting table. Unlike emeralds and diamonds, they will not fall in value if new gemstone deposits are discovered.

As such, they make an exceptionally stable medium for regional trade, and are the only currency that will be universally accepted in a $(l:overview/commodity_markets)Commodity Market$().$(p)The $(bold)Silver Piece$() is a low-value coin suitable for everyday transactions.
For large transactions or bulk storage, 64 Silver Pieces can be converted to one $(bold)Gold Piece$() and vice versa at any $(l:overview/market_board)Market Board$().
